alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montezuma County through 530 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cortez, or 32 miles north of Shiprock, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Montezuma County. This includes U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 30 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
